title: ðŸ‘¤The Dark Side
description:
Your powers have an unsavory source, and sometimes  you get tempted to do things you shouldnâ€™t. These could be orders from whatever granted your power, or urges that bubble up from your subconscious. Something like that. Whatever it is, itâ€™s unsettling.

Pick three tags for your dark side:

title: Telepathy
description: You can read people's thoughts and put words in their mind. This can allow you to **investigate a mystery** or **read a bad situation** without needing to actually talk. You can also **manipulate someone** without speaking. You still roll moves as normal, except people will not expect the weirdness of your mental communication.

outcomes.text: When you cast a spell (with **use magic**), as well as the normal effects, you may pick from the following:
bullets: The target immediately suffers harm (2-harm magic ignore-armour).
The target breaks something precious or important.

title: The Sight
description: You can see the invisible, especially spirits and magical influences. You may communicate with (maybe even make deals with) the spirits you see, and they give you more opportunities to spot clues when you **investigate a mystery**.

title: Premonitions (+Weird)
description: At the start of each mystery, roll +Weird.

outcomes.text: You get a detailed vision of something bad that is yet to happen. You take +1 forward to prevent it coming true, and mark experience if you stop it.
You get clouded images of something bad that is yet to happen: mark experience if you stop it.
You get a vision of something bad happening to you and the Keeper holds 3, to be spent one-for-one as penalties to rolls you make.

title: Hunches (+Sharp)
description: When something bad is happening (or just about to happen) somewhere that you aren't, roll +Sharp.

outcomes.text: You knew where you needed to go, just in time to get there.
You get there lateâ€”in time to intervene, but not prevent it altogether.
You get there just in time to be in trouble yourself.

title: Tune In (+Weird)
description: You can attune your mind to a monster or minion. Roll +Weird.

outcomes.text: Hold 3. Spend one hold to ask the Keeper one of the following questions, and gain +1 ongoing while acting on the answers:
bullets: Where is the creature right now?
What is it planning to do right now?
Who is it going to attack next?
Who does it regard as the biggest threat?
How can I attract its attention?

outcomes.text: The monster becomes aware of you.

title: The Big Whammy
description: You can use your powers to **kick some ass**: roll +Weird instead of +Tough. The attack has 2-harm close obvious ignore-armour. On a miss, you'll get a magical backlash.

title: Jinx (+Weird)
description: You can encourage coincidences to occur, the way you want. When you jinx a target, roll +Weird.

bullets: Interfere with a hunter, giving them -1 forward.
Help a hunter, giving them +1 forward, by interfering with their enemy.
Interfere with what a monster, minion, or bystander is trying to do.
Inflict 1-harm on the target due to an accident.
The target finds something you left for them.
The target loses something that you will soon find.

outcomes.text: The Keeper holds 2 over you to be used in the same way.

title: Gear
description: You get two normal weapons and any magical items or amulets that you use to invoke your powers.

submoves.title: Ask
submoves.description: The Keeper can ask you to do nasty things (in accordance with the tags), when your  powers need you to. If you do whatever is asked, mark experience. If you donâ€™t do it, then your powers are unavailable until the end of the mystery (or until you cave). As you mark off Luck boxes, these requests will get bigger and nastier

title: Improvement
description: When you have filled all five experience boxes, you level up. Erase the marks and pick from below.
pick: Change some, or all, your dark side tags
Get a mystical library, like the Expert's haven option
Take a move from another playbook
Take a move from another playbook

submoves.title: Mystical Library
submoves.description: If you use your library's occult tomes and grimoires, preparing with your tomes and grimoires, take +1 forward for **use magic**.

title: Advanced Improvements
description: After you have leveled up *five* times, you additionally qualify for advanced improvements.
pick: Change this hunter to a new type
Create a second hunter to play as well as this one
Mark two of the basic moves as advanced
Mark another two of the basic moves as advanced
You discover how to use your powers at a lower price. Delete one dark side tag permanently
Get back one used Luck point
